blocks.content:
## Welcome to the Dynatrace Playground for Astroshop Inc.
Astroshop is the premier OpenTelemetry community demo application. In our Dynatrace Playground environment we are operating an instance of Astroshop, deployed with ArgoCD and observed with OpenTelemetry and OneAgent on a Kubernetes Cluster. We are generating 24/7 HTTP traffic and we are doing automated configuration changes during the day. Some of those changes will cause problems that we have seen in real life such as high failure rate, drop in sales, ...

We have prepared role specific best practice dashboards so that you can explore Astroshop through the eyes of a Developer, Business Owner, SRE, DevOps or Platform Engineer! 
In each section you see a video and a quick animation of the best practice flow. Click on it and you can explore it yourself. 

If you scroll down you can also watch videos from our Dynatrace engineers that implemented these use cases.

## Explore Astroshop through the eyes of a Developer!
You are a developer, responsible for the health of your critical services that power Astroshop! Dynatrace is here to make your life easier!

| [Watch!](https://youtube.com/dynatrace) | [Access](https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/monaco-c933bd19-0c7a-32f2-9e19-2a9ad94e1cc6) the Developer Self-Service Dashboard
 --- | --- 
[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-perfclinics/community-tips-tricks/refs/heads/main/images/jr2025/DevUseCaseVideoTumbnail.png)](https://youtube.com/dynatrace) | Analyze the health of your services, diagnose problematic logs and traces and identify whether a recent deployment caused a business issue! [![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-perfclinics/community-tips-tricks/refs/heads/main/images/jr2025/DevDashboard_animated.gif)](https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/monaco-c933bd19-0c7a-32f2-9e19-2a9ad94e1cc6)

## Explore Astroshop through the eyes of a Business Owner
You are responsible for Astroshops business success. You need to make sure that orders are coming in and products can be shipped on time. 

| [Watch!](https://youtube.com/dynatrace) | [Access](https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/monaco-5c7ed04e-67a6-32c8-8ed2-b1840cdebae0) the Business Dashboard
 --- | --- 
[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-perfclinics/community-tips-tricks/refs/heads/main/images/jr2025/BizUseCaseVideoTumbnail.png)](https://youtube.com/dynatrace) | Track your Business KPIs and understand whether a drop in revenue is caused by a release gone wrong, an infrastructure issue or whether you just don't sell the products your users want! [![](https://github.com/dynatrace-perfclinics/community-tips-tricks/blob/main/images/jr2025/BizDashboard_animated.gif?raw=true)](https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/monaco-5c7ed04e-67a6-32c8-8ed2-b1840cdebae0)

## Explore Astroshop through the eyes of an an SRE, DevOps or Platform Engineer
Astroshop constantly gets new features and updates of the eCommerce platform. As a DevOps & Platform Engineer you want to know how often new releases go out and how long it takes. As an SRE you want to know whether your system stays resilient.

| [Watch!](https://youtube.com/dynatrace) | [Access](https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/monaco-de76b1b8-8467-3697-83df-76f4fe868ed6) the Platform Engineering Dashboard
 --- | --- 
[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-perfclinics/community-tips-tricks/refs/heads/main/images/jr2025/DevOpsUseCaseVideoTumbnail.png)](https://youtube.com/dynatrace) | Analyze your ArgoCD Deployments, Git & Pull Request Activity and see whether your releases match your expectations or cause business disruption! [![](https://github.com/dynatrace-perfclinics/community-tips-tricks/blob/main/images/jr2025/SREDashboard_animated.gif?raw=true)](https://guu84124.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/monaco-de76b1b8-8467-3697-83df-76f4fe868ed6)
